typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		mandt as string,
		procs_id as string,
		ricefw_id as string,
		log_begda as string,
		seqno as string,
		rerun_seqno as string,
		log_begti as string,
		log_endda as string,
		log_endti as string,
		pay_begda as string,
		pay_endda as string,
		process_start as string,
		process_end as string,
		process_starttime as string,
		process_endtime as string,
		tot_records as string,
		suc_records as string,
		rej_records as string,
		avg_runtime as string,
		max_runtime as string,
		pabrp as string,
		pabrj as string,
		job_status as string,
		last_modified_date as string,
		last_modified_time as string,
		custom1 as string,
		custom2 as string,
		custom3 as string,
		custom4 as string,
		custom5 as string,
		custom6 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> BlobContainer
BlobContainer alterRow(upsertIf(procs_id==procs_id)) ~> UpdateOrInsert
UpdateOrInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		mandt as integer,
		procs_id as string,
		ricefw_id as string,
		log_begda as string,
		seqno as string,
		rerun_seqno as string,
		log_begti as string,
		log_endda as string,
		log_endti as string,
		pay_begda as string,
		pay_endda as string,
		process_start as string,
		process_end as string,
		process_starttime as string,
		process_endtime as string,
		tot_records as string,
		suc_records as string,
		rej_records as string,
		avg_runtime as string,
		max_runtime as string,
		pabrp as string,
		pabrj as string,
		job_status as string,
		last_modified_date as string,
		last_modified_time as string,
		custom1 as string,
		custom2 as string,
		custom3 as string,
		custom4 as string,
		custom5 as string,
		custom6 as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['procs_id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> AzureSQLDB
